text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem cs-ocebm-2011-levels-of-evidence

This case-insensitive code system http://fhir.awmf.org/awmf.ig/CodeSystem/cs-ocebm-2011-levels-of-evidence defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinitionDeutsch (German, de)
level1 Systematic Reviews and Randomized TrialsIncludes systematic reviews of randomized trials or n-of-1 trials.Systematische Reviews und randomisierte Studien
level2 Cohort StudiesIncludes systematic reviews of cohort studies or individual cohort studies and low-quality randomized trials.Kohortenstudien
level3 Case-Control StudiesIncludes systematic reviews of case-control studies or individual case-control studies.Fall-Kontroll-Studie
level4 Case SeriesIncludes case series and poor-quality cohort and case-control studies.Fallserien
level5 Expert OpinionIncludes expert opinion without explicit critical appraisal, or based on physiology, bench research, or 'first principles'.Expertenmeinung

name: OCEBM2011LevelsOfEvidence
title: OCEBM 2011 Levels of Evidence
description: CodeSystem representing the Oxford Centre for Evidence-Based Medicine 2011 Levels of Evidence.

concept.definition: Includes systematic reviews of randomized trials or n-of-1 trials.

extension.valueString: Schließt systematische Reviews von randomisierten Studien oder n-of-1-Studien ein.

concept.definition: Includes systematic reviews of cohort studies or individual cohort studies and low-quality randomized trials.

extension.valueString: Schließt systematische Reviews von Kohortenstudien oder einzelne Kohortenstudien oder randomisierte Studien mit niedriger Qualität ein.

concept.definition: Includes systematic reviews of case-control studies or individual case-control studies.

extension.valueString: Schließt systematische Reviews von Fall-Kontroll-Studien oder einzelne Fall-Kontroll-Studien.

concept.definition: Includes case series and poor-quality cohort and case-control studies.

extension.valueString: Schließt Fallserien sowie Kohorten- und Fall-Kontroll-Studien mit niedriger Qualität ein.

concept.definition: Includes expert opinion without explicit critical appraisal, or based on physiology, bench research, or 'first principles'.

extension.valueString: Umfasst Expertenmeinung(en) ohne explizite kritische Beurteilung oder auf der Grundlage von Physiologie, Bench Research oder First Principles
